channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti bench at the back of Peregrine Court between Barbel Court., 14th August
item.description:
Graffiti bench at the back of Peregrine Court between Barbel Court.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Common, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree, hard to get past, 14th August
item.description:
This tree (outside no.20) and a few more in the close need vast trimming back. I have regularly seen the elderly and visual impaired struggle to get past it. The weeds surrounds the tree are growing so far out onto the pavement now. This has been a problem for over a year, my neighbour said he reported but nothing was done. This is same along all the Close with other ground weeds growing out of control on others. Thank you very much

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Albany Close, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missed collection, 14th August
item.description:
Hello. I reported my bin collection as missed. I put it out at 7am as requested and received a report that they had attempted to collect it at 6.45am. I was told to put it out by 7am, which I did. Please return to collect it as it is outside the house WasteWorks ref: 8021767
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hawes Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Gipsy Hill SE19 on the opposite side of the road to, 13th August
item.description:
Gipsy Hill SE19 on the opposite side of the road to number 138 black Lambeth pavement litter bin tagged per picture. (Bin on Lambeth side of the road – 138 is on Southwark side just to be clear.) Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4250294,-0.0837082,3a,75y,256.66h,70.69t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sSZqgdJj8lROZqeOMqWwaCQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D19.310000000000002%26panoid%3DSZqgdJj8lROZqeOMqWwaCQ%26yaw%3D256.66!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgxMS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gipsy Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
